projects.title: Central Valley News
projects.description: Central Valley News serves as a centralized hub for articles from multiple news publications providing a convenient and comprehensive source of news and information for users.
highlights: I played a role in designing the architecture of the web scraper and establishing the cron job
collaborated within an agile development environment alongside a team of seven to construct this project in accordance with project specifications
I contributed to the frontend development team tasked with building the frontend using React

projects.title: Frontend Quiz
projects.description: Frontend Quiz is a interactive quiz application that test and enhance knowledge in key areas of frontend development, focusing on JavaScript, CSS, HTML, and accessibility principles.
highlights: Quiz attempts are recorded and average is displayed for each quiz
Confetti animation for scores greater than 80%
A 30 second time limit for each question

projects.title: MovieSpot
projects.description: MovieSpot is an entertainment web application that showcases the most popular movies and TV series.
highlights: Authentication System using Bcrypt and Iron Session
End to end type safety with GraphQL

projects.title: Audiophile
projects.description: Audiophile is a fictional ecommerce site for headphones.

projects.title: Where in the world
projects.description: Where in the world displays information about all the countries in the world provided by the REST countries API.
